title: Lifestyle Color Taste Explorer
description: Answer 5 simple questions to find the Ploom X case color that suits you best.

questions.text: Choose the word that best represents your personality.
Which word would your friends use to describe you?
If you were a kind of weather, what would you be?

options.text: A clear dusk with golden sunlight
A cool sea breeze under blue skies
A passionate summer day full of sunshine
A quiet night with twinkling stars

questions.text: Which element attracts you the most?
If you were an animal, which would you be?
How would you describe your first impression?
After a meal, what sweet treat would you choose?

options.text: Sweet cake or chocolate, the sweeter the better
Cool ice cream or mint candy, refreshing and light

questions.text: For weekend brunch, what would you rather have?

options.text: A delicate French croissant with coffee

questions.text: For afternoon tea, what would you pick?

options.text: Fragrant green tea or floral tea

questions.text: For a late-night snack, what do you crave most?

options.text: Hot instant noodles or fried chicken bites

questions.text: At a cafe, what do you usually order?

options.text: Hand-pour single-origin coffee for the flavor

questions.text: When buying accessories, what matters most to you?

options.text: Texture and taste, it must feel premium
Practical and timeless, classic and durable

questions.text: When buying clothes, what do you usually choose?

options.text: Versatile basics that never go out of style

questions.text: When choosing a phone case, what do you pick?
When choosing sunglasses, what would you pick?

options.text: Gold or silver frames with premium feel

questions.text: When buying a bag, what do you care about most?

options.text: Brand quality and a luxury feel
Capacity and practicality, easy to carry

questions.text: What's your ideal vacation destination?

options.text: A tropical island with sun and beach
Forests and mountains, close to nature

questions.text: What do you most want to do on the weekend?

options.text: Enjoy a fine meal at an upscale restaurant
Stay home, binge shows, and unwind
Go out and have fun with friends

questions.text: At a party, you usually...

options.text: Become the center of attention and lift the vibe
Find a few close friends and chat quietly

questions.text: For exercise, what do you prefer?
When traveling, what do you prefer?

options.text: Staying at boutique hotels with great service
Staying in homestays for local life

questions.text: When shopping, where do you go first?
Which home style do you like?
When decorating your room, what would you add?
What's your ideal bedroom lighting?

options.text: Warm yellow light with cozy atmosphere
Bright white light, clean and fresh

questions.text: When choosing bedsheets, what would you pick?

options.text: Light blue or light green tones

questions.text: What would you most want in your living room?
When listening to music, what do you prefer?
When you're stressed, what do you do?

options.text: Eat and drink to treat yourself

questions.text: When taking photos, what filter style do you like?

options.text: Fresh and natural with blue tones

questions.text: When you're in a good mood, what do you do?

options.text: Walk by the beach or in a park

questions.text: When watching movies, what do you choose most often?
Before bed, you usually...

options.text: Scroll social media on your phone
Read or listen to music to relax

questions.text: When choosing perfume, what notes do you like?

options.text: Woody or leather notes, mature and steady
Marine or fresh notes, clean and comfortable
Fruity/floral or sweet notes, romantic and soft
Smoky or musk notes, mysterious and deep
Blended or unique notes, different from others

questions.text: If you could learn one skill, what would you choose?
On social media, what is your profile picture style?

options.text: A premium gift with elegant packaging

questions.text: If you had a pet, what would you choose?
When choosing a car, what matters most?
When you're tired from work, what do you want?

options.text: Some fresh air by the sea or in the mountains

Go home and rest quietly alone
Do something fun to reset your mood

questions.text: For a date, where would you rather go?

options.text: Walk by the beach at sunset

questions.text: Choose a dream superpower.

questions.text: Which kind of gathering do you prefer?

options.text: Fabric or plush, warm and cozy
